name: maker-management-platform
description: Maker Agent is part of an open-source ERP platform for makers and small businesses. It automates purchase orders, production workflows, and inventory movement and runs via self-hosted web infrastructure.
features: Purchase order automation: Generate and track purchase orders for materials and components automatically.
Production workflows: Define and manage manufacturing processes with task dependencies and scheduling.
Inventory tracking: Monitor stock levels, locations, and movements across warehouses and production lines.
Bill of materials: Create and maintain BOMs for products with component requirements and quantities.
Supplier management: Track vendor information, pricing, lead times, and order history.
Work order system: Create production jobs with resource allocation and progress tracking.
Cost tracking: Calculate production costs including materials, labor, and overhead for accurate pricing.
Quality control: Record inspections, defects, and quality metrics throughout the manufacturing process.
Reporting dashboard: View key metrics like production efficiency, inventory turnover, and order status.
Multi-location support: Manage operations across multiple facilities with centralized visibility.
API integration: Connect with external systems for accounting, shipping, or e-commerce platforms.
User permissions: Control access to features based on roles like admin, production, or purchasing.
